tool.name: Enrich dataset with WoRMS
tool.description: Enrich dataset with measurement type data from WoRMS

param.name: include_inherited
param.label: include attributes inherited from parent taxon

param.name: pivot_wider
param.label: one hot encoding on the measurement types

tool.help:
================== **What it does ?** ==================
This tool requests WoRMS (World Register of Marine Species) to get data about a specific by accessing the entry returned by an its scientific name, it looks for the measurementType(s) requested by the user and select the associated measurement value to add it to a dataset.
=================== **How to use it ?** ===================
## Parameters:
- **data**: a dataset containing a variable of scientific names. - **list of measurement types**: a list of measurements types present in WoRMS (ex: Development, Fecundity, Size ...) separated by ','. - **scientific names column name**: the name of column in the dataset containing scientific names. - **include attributes inherited from parent taxon**: usefull when the data you are looking for are incomplete. - **one hot encoding on the measurement types**: each possible values of a measurementType becomes a column encoded in 0/1
## Outputs:
The inputed dataset with columns of measurement types or measurements
